HeadComp.title: 100+ Third Party Integrations | WhatsApp Business API, SMS, Emails, RCS and Voice
HeadComp.description: MSG91 Integrates with Shopify, WebEngage, MoEngage, CleverTap, Tally, WooCommerce, ZohoCRM, Kylas, Zapier, Hubspot, Google Sheets and many other softwares for Automating communication Messages with MSG91 Built-in plugins to boost your business sales.

IntegrationsComp.heading: Integrations & Add-ons
IntegrationsComp.subheading: Add-ons that enable SMS notifications in your application with a single click.

plugins.name: Shopify
plugins.description: MSG91 have a native integration with shopify which allow you to send notifications and alerts on multiple events (i.e. Order Updates, Abandoned cart and checkouts) and you can sync MSG91's Segmento with shopify account to capture the user events and their journey to run marketing and  retention campaigns, also you can set up a hello chat widget and whatsapp widget on the website and many more.

plugins.name: Zoho CRM
plugins.description: MSG91 offers native plugin for zoho crm through which you can automate the omnichannel campaigns for multiple lead stages and workflow conditions. You can manually run personalized multichannel bulk campaigns on specific segments directly from your Zoho CRM panel.MSG91 also provides webhooks for inbound and outbound whatsapp messages to capture the logs and responses and many more features you can explore through the plugin.

plugins.name: Clevertap
plugins.description: MSG91 has SMS and Whatsapp integration with CleverTap. You can run sms and whatsapp campaigns on specific segments of your CleverTap account and also the sent delivery failed and click reports you can track in your  CleverTap panel itself for different campaigns. You can also send different type of whatsapp templates (i.e. Carousel, Limited time offer, flow) on single and bulk data which allows you to plan your marketing strategies more effectively.

plugins.name: WebEngage
plugins.description: MSG91 has SMS and WhatsApp integration with WebEngage. You can run sms and WhatsApp campaigns on specific segments of your WebEngage account and also the sent delivery failed and click reports you can track in your WebEngage panel itself for different campaigns. You can also send different type of WhatsApp templates (i.e. Carousel, Limited time offer, Flow) on single and bulk data which allows you to plan your marketing strategies more effectively.

plugins.name: MoEngage
plugins.description: MSG91 has SMS and WhatsApp integration with MoEngage. You can run sms and WhatsApp campaigns on specific segments of your MoEngage account and also the sent delivery failed and click reports you can track in your MoEngage panel itself for different campaigns. You can also send different type of WhatsApp templates (i.e. Carousel, Limited time offer, Flow) on single and bulk data which allows you to plan your marketing strategies more effectively.

plugins.name: Tally
plugins.description: This plugin offers a range of features to help you streamline your invoicing and ledger management processes. In this help document, we will explore the top three key features and their associated benefits.
extra: Send Vouchers via Whatsapp or Email (Credit note, Debit Note,Journal Voucher,Payment,Purchase,Receipt,Sales)
Resend Voucher or Invoice Manually via Email or WhatsApp

plugins.name: Kylas
plugins.description: You can integrate MSG91 services with your Kylas CRM and make triggers automated according to your leads and contact stages. It allows you to communicate with your customers Via SMS,Whatsapp,Email,RCS and Voice.

plugins.name: Freshworks
plugins.description: Automate your customer communication model by using MSG91! Send customized communications through Email, Text Message, RCS and Whatsapp for Deal/Contact related alerts. Increasing your customer reach with automation and boost sales.

plugins.name: MS Excel
plugins.description: MSG91 has created a one stop solution for all MS Excel users to send communication through multiple channels like Text message, Whatsapp, RCS, Emails and Voice Call.

plugins.name: Google Sheets
plugins.description: MSG91 has created a one stop solution for all Google Spreadsheet users to send communication through multiple channels like Text message, Whatsapp, RCS, Emails and Voice Call.

plugins.name: Auth0
plugins.description: MSG91 has created a one stop solution for all Auth0 users to send Multi Factor Authentication communication(MFA) through multiple channels like Text message, Whatsapp, RCS, Emails and Voice Call.

connectors.name: viaSocket
connectors.description: viaSocket is an AI-powered workflow automation tool that lets you connect thousands of apps and automate tasks with ease—all without needing any coding skills. It’s the perfect solution to simplify your workflows and save time.

connectors.name: Zapier
connectors.description: Zapier lets you connect MSG91 with thousands of the most popular apps, so you can automate your work and have more time for what matters most — no code required.

connectors.name: Pabbly
connectors.description: Connect MSG91 with more than 1000+ apps. Just select the app and you're good to go. No installation required!

connectors.name: Integrately
connectors.description: Integrately gives you LOTS of pre-made automations. So you can activate automations in 1 click!

plugins.name: ​UnitedSol (Shopify)
plugins.title: Shopify OTP Login Extension:
plugins.description: Enhance authentication on Shopify with the OTP Login with Phone app, enabling customers to securely log in and sign up using their phone numbers and email.

plugins.name: ​UnitedSol (WooCommerce)
plugins.title: WooCommerce OTP Login Extension:
plugins.description: Streamline customer access with Registration & Login via Mobile Phone Number for WooCommerce. Empower users to log in effortlessly with secure OTP verification, eliminating password hassles!

plugins.name: ​UnitedSol (Magento)
plugins.title: Magento 2 OTP Login Extension:
plugins.description: Boost security and user experience with the Magento 2 OTP Login Extension by FMEextensions. Allow customers to log in or register seamlessly via an OTP sent through SMS or email.

section.heading: Don’t see the Add-on or Plugin you are looking for?
section.subtag: We would be glad to add you too.

build.line: All the revenues on the plugin will be yours and it will be your plugin.
We will provide free OTP SMS (one time) to every plug-in users.
Mentoring for developing plug-in for your choice of platform.
We will promote your plugin using Google ad, blogs, mail to all our 40K clients.

card.name: Bharat Kumar
card.content: We are happy partnering with MSG91, the team has been prompt in addressing the queries and taking our partnership ahead. Thank you MSG91

card.name: Prateek Agrawal
card.content: Our long standing Partnership with MSG91 has been very successful. The quality of services and support MSG91 provides is excellent. We have been treated with a positive response every single time.
